https://tmrev.io/movie/57465-Come Into the Light 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tGkhPZOknf3cowMxcdK900OJsS.jpg In 1990s Palermo, Pino Puglisi is a priest from the neglected Brancaccio neighborhood dedicated in helping kids to get off the streets and creating an embracing place of hope and solidarity in his church, which means trouble for the local Mafia. He continues his solitary fight until the bitter end. Come Into the Light
